bgpp2011

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • bgpp2011.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller class is the class that does all the checks and calculations requested by the GUI. It is the class that makes the calls for changes in the database, and the class that holds both the Model and the Nexus.
    Author:
    tbrj

    • Method Detail

      • checkReservation

        public boolean checkReservation(model.Reservation re)
        This method check if a reservation overlaps another reservation. It compares the dates of the reservation given in the parameter with the dates from all reservations in the HashMap reservations. It uses the String-types compare method to check if the dates are overlapping.
        Parameters:
        re -
        Returns:
        boolean; returns true if the reservation in not overlapping any reservations in the collection: reservations.

      • vehiclesByType

        public java.util.ArrayList<model.Vehicle> vehiclesByType(model.VehicleType v)
        This code returns an ArrayList of vehicles grouped by the type they belong to, which is specified in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        v - a the VehicleType which selects the vehicles
        Returns:
        ArrayList an ArrayList containing the vehicles grouped by type

      • typeCounting

        public int typeCounting(model.VehicleType v,
               java.sql.Date start,
               java.sql.Date end)
        This method is used when counting the number of vehicles avalaible in a certain date-range.
        Parameters:
        v - the VehicleType of which the vehicles should be counted
        start - the Date object containing information about the Start of the range
        end - the Date object containing information about the End of the date-range.
        Returns:
        int an Integer counting the number of free vehicles in the type.

      • vacantVehicles

        public java.util.ArrayList<model.Vehicle> vacantVehicles(model.VehicleType v,
                                                java.sql.Date start,
                                                java.sql.Date end)
        This method is used to fetch an arraylist of vehicles containing vehicles which are free to rent in the specified daterange, grouped by type.
        Parameters:
        v - the VehicleType of which the vehicles should be selected.
        start - the Date object containing information about the Start of the range
        end - the Date object containing information about the End of the date-range.
        Returns:
        ArrayList a list containing the avalaible vehicles.

      • searchVehicles

        public model.Vehicle searchVehicles(model.VehicleType v,
                           java.sql.Date start,
                           java.sql.Date end)
        Makes a list of free vehicles using the vacantVehicles()-method. Returns the first vehicle in that list. Else it returns null.
        Parameters:
        v - a VehivleType object
        start - A Date object containing the startdate
        end - a Date object containing the eddate
        Returns:
        Vehivle returns a vehicle of the type v, that is free between the start and enddate. If there is no such car, it returns null.

      • createReservation

        public model.Reservation createReservation(model.Customer c,
                                  model.VehicleType t,
                                  java.sql.Date start,
                                  java.sql.Date end)
        Creates a reservation. It checks if there is a free vehicle of the type t, between the start and end Date. If there is, it sends the reservation to the database, and gets the reservation back with a valid id. Then it returns the reservation.
        Parameters:
        c - a Customer object
        t - a VehivleType Object
        start - a Date object
        end - a Date object
        Returns:
        Reservation object returns null if creation was unsuccesful.

      • createCustomer

        public model.Customer createCustomer(java.lang.String name,
                            int phonenumber,
                            java.lang.String address,
                            java.lang.String bankaccount)
        Creates a new customer. It checks if a customer with the same name and phonenumber is already in the system. If he is not, the system will send the customer to the database, and get the same customer with a valid id back.
        Parameters:
        name - String
        phonenumber - int
        address - String
        bankaccount - String
        Returns:
        Customer object returns null if creations was unsuccessful.

      • createVehicle

        public model.Vehicle createVehicle(java.lang.String make,
                          java.lang.String vmodel,
                          int year,
                          model.VehicleType v)
        Creates a new vehicle. Checks if v is a valid VehivleType. If it is, it sends the vehicle to the database, which returns the vehicle with a valid id.
        Parameters:
        make - String
        vmodel - String
        year - int
        v - VehicleType object
        Returns:
        Vehicle object null if v is not a valid VehicleType.

      • createVehicleType

        public boolean createVehicleType(java.lang.String name,
                        double price)
        Creates a new VehicleType. Checks if a type with the same name already exists. If not, it sends the type to the database, which sends it back with a valid id.
        Parameters:
        name - String
        price - double
        Returns:
        boolean false if the name already exists.

      • deleteReservation

        public boolean deleteReservation(model.Reservation r)
        Deletes a Reservation. It deletes a reservation from the database. Returns true of the deletion was successful, else it returns false.
        Parameters:
        r - Reservation object.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • deleteCustomer

        public boolean deleteCustomer(model.Customer c)
        Deletes a Customer. If the deletion was successful, it runs trough all reservations, and deletes the reservations made by the deleted customer. Returns true if deletion was success.
        Parameters:
        c - Customer object
        Returns:
        boolean

      • deleteVehicle

        public boolean deleteVehicle(model.Vehicle v)
        Deletes a vehicle. If deletion was successful, it runs through all reservations, and deletes the reservations of the deleted vehicle. Returns true if deletion was successful.
        Parameters:
        v - Vehivle object
        Returns:
        boolean

      • deleteVehicleType

        public boolean deleteVehicleType(model.VehicleType vt)
        Deletes a VehicleType. Returns true of deletion was successful.
        Parameters:
        vt - VehicleType object
        Returns:
        boolean

      • editReservation

        public boolean editReservation(model.Reservation newR,
                      model.Reservation oldR)

        Parameters:
        newR - Reservation Object
        oldR - Reservation object
        Returns:
        boolean
